page.title: 05IRVINE SMALL CO.
page.content: One of the{small companies}attracted to Irvine is Andrew Wright. The products they make (windows and doors) go to hospitals,schools, houses and government buildings. Their materials, like the timber and aluminium, come from all over the world but the glass is manufactured in St. Helens, England. They use machines like saws, drills, routers and washing machines. The company began in Ayr in l937 and Irvine was the only place with factory space. The factory finds Irvine a bit remote in Britain so it is a bit of a problem for transport. The{Scottish {Development Agency}give them redevelopment grants and they buy machinery with the money. 3O people are employed at the factory doing jobs like fabricating, manufacturing,fixing selling products and office work.
